creator: jblecker@de.ibm.com
text:
Similar to Bug report 31210 "Problematic competition between mod_rewrite and 
mod_dir"
Our Env:
AIX 5300-05-06
Apache 2.2.6
PHP 2.2.5

With both modules loaded, we get a response like: 
- Requests per second:  0.51 [#/sec]
With deactivated mod_dir or mod_rewrite we have a response like:
- Requests per second:  444.01 [#/sec] to 1800 [#/sec] 

We need urgent help!! 

Many thanks in advance!
BR Juergen

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
This sounds like something that would be better answered in a user support
forum. There is no specific reason to believe you found a bug.

If really think this is a bug, you should provide details of your configuration
and do some strace/debugging on the problematic configuration. Many millions of
apache servers happily run mod_dir and mod_rewrite together, so your report
doesn't give anything to go on.
